posts.title: Giant Fist Drink Cozy
posts.content: Keep your precious beer safe from sticky fingers and cooler than a polar bear’s toe nails with the giant fist drink cozy. This monstrous cozy is like a hulk hand for alcoholics, it protects your ice cold beer while keeping your hands nice and dry.

posts.title: Adventure Log
posts.content: Relive your greatest journeys whenever you wish by keeping detailed accounts of them in this adventure log. The log is compact enough to fit comfortably in your pocket and comes with 48 blank pages ready to be filled up by your epic travel exploits.

posts.title: Wireless Video Baby Monitor
posts.content: Keep an eye on your precious bundle of joy at all times using this wireless video baby monitor. This high tech monitor comes with two-way audio as well as a 2.8″ color LCD monitor and infrared night vision to ensure Jr. remains safe and sound.

posts.title: Seasaw Pool Rocker Toy
posts.content: The seasaw pool rocker toy will have the young ones hanging on while they hang out and cool off in the pool. Once aboard the rocker, the kids can either use it as a boat to float around or grab onto the handles and begin rocking away.

posts.title: Gold Panning Kit
posts.content: Quit your day job and get on the fast-track to success using this gold panning kit. Just walk to up to your local river or park, scoop up some dirt and watch in amazement as you find <del>nothing of value</del> gold nugget after nugget right below your feet.

posts.title: Millennium Falcon Bottle Opener
posts.content: Get yourself wasted in less than 12 parsecs with this geeky Star Wars Millennium Falcon bottle opener. Perfect for any cantina, the Millennium Falcon bottle opener features a metal framed body with a convenient magnet placed on the back of it.

posts.title: Bathtub Hair Catcher
posts.content: Avoid clogging your drains with nasty balls of wet hair by using this bathtub hair catcher. This plastic device fits snugly into your tub’s drain and collects every loose hair that falls through. After each shower you simply pull out the plastic device to leave the drain clog-free.

posts.title: Crystal Growing Kit
posts.content: Make learning fun for your little scholars in training by giving them this crystal growing kit. Both easy and safe to use, the kit comes with everything necessary to grow dozens of brightly colored crystals that can be molded into fun shapes like stars and dolphins.

posts.title: T-Rex Duvet Cover
posts.content: Make your little dinosaur lover’s prehistoric dreams come true with this awesome T-Rex duvet cover. This cozy 100% percaline cotton bedspread comes emblazoned with a giant ferocious T-Rex that creates the illusion he’s eating whoever is tucked into the bed.

posts.title: Indoor Ninja Blowgun Kit
posts.content: Use your downtime to hone your deadly warrior skills with this indoor ninja blowgun kit. The kit includes two 30 inch blowguns, 24 soft ammo darts, and a Styrofoam target that you can place anywhere to work on your aim and accuracy at anytime.

posts.title: Amazon Echo Dot Gen 3
posts.content: The third generation of the Amazon Echo Dot is here with a slimmed down minimalist design that will look good in any part of your home or office. Apart from the sleek design, it boasts a more potent internal speaker and can connect to other smart devices in your home.

posts.title: Roomba i7+ Robotic Vacuum
posts.content: Ensure your home looks spic-and-span at all times by placing the brand new Roomba i7+ robotic vacuum on the job! This revolutionary device automatically empties itself when it docks at the base and features improved home mapping for more efficient cleaning.
